5 Awesome News Mashup Sites

Published: 2009-11-25

There are so many great news sites out there. From traditional news, to bloggers, to social submission sites, following them all can be overwhelming. Luckily there are mashups that bring all these wonderful sites to one place. This makes keeping track of the latest and greatest much easier.

Here is a list of 5 awesome news mashup sites.

JimmyR My personal favorite site. This could easily over take googles position as my homepage. Plus the guy who runs it is pretty smart and he has a lot of other random good things on his site like tutorials.

OurSignal This one has a pretty cool interface. Don't know if I could use it long term though.

POPURLS This is the name most people think of when they think news mashup. Oldie but goody.

Alltop This one has more categories than just "news" so it may be worth cecking out if you're looking for something new or specific.

originalsignal Very tech centered mashup. All internet related news.

Use a different mashup? Let me know in the comments.

Comments have been removed in my sites latest upgrade. They may or may not come back.
